description: Use the browser.telemetry API to send telemetry data to the Mozilla Telemetry service. Restricted to Mozilla privileged webextensions.

types.description: Type of scalar: 'count' for numeric values, 'string' for string values, 'boolean' for boolean values. Maps to nsITelemetry.SCALAR_TYPE_*.
Represents registration data for a Telemetry scalar.

keyed.description: True if this is a keyed scalar.

record_on_release.description: True if this data should be recorded on release.

expired.description: True if this scalar entry is expired. This allows recording it without error, but it will be discarded.

types.description: Represents registration data for a Telemetry event.

methods.description: List of methods for this event entry.

objects.description: List of objects for this event entry.

extra_keys.description: List of allowed extra keys for this event entry.

record_on_release.description: True if this data should be recorded on release.

expired.description: True if this event entry is expired. This allows recording it without error, but it will be discarded.

functions.name: submitPing
functions.description: Submits a custom ping to the Telemetry back-end. See submitExternalPing inside TelemetryController.jsm for more details.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The data payload for the ping.

addClientId.description: True if the ping should contain the client id.

addEnvironment.description: True if the ping should contain the environment data.

overrideEnvironment.description: Set to override the environment data.

usePingSender.description: If true, send the ping using the PingSender.

functions.name: canUpload
functions.description: Checks if Telemetry upload is enabled.

functions.name: scalarAdd
functions.description: Adds the value to the given scalar.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The numeric value to add to the scalar. Only unsigned integers supported.

functions.name: scalarSet
functions.description: Sets the named scalar to the given value. Throws if the value type doesn't match the scalar type.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set the scalar to

functions.name: scalarSetMaximum
functions.description: Sets the scalar to the maximum of the current and the passed value

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The numeric value to set the scalar to. Only unsigned integers supported.

functions.name: keyedScalarAdd
functions.description: Adds the value to the given keyed scalar.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The numeric value to add to the scalar. Only unsigned integers supported.

functions.name: keyedScalarSet
functions.description: Sets the keyed scalar to the given value. Throws if the value type doesn't match the scalar type.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set the scalar to.

functions.name: keyedScalarSetMaximum
functions.description: Sets the keyed scalar to the maximum of the current and the passed value

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The numeric value to set the scalar to. Only unsigned integers supported.

functions.name: recordEvent
functions.description: Record an event in Telemetry. Throws when trying to record an unknown event.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: An optional string value to record.

parameters.name: extra
parameters.description: An optional object of the form (string -> string). It should only contain registered extra keys.

functions.name: registerScalars
functions.description: Register new scalars to record them from addons. See nsITelemetry.idl for more details.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The unique category the scalars are registered in.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An object that contains registration data for multiple scalars. Each property name is the scalar name, and the corresponding property value is an object of ScalarData type.

functions.name: registerEvents
functions.description: Register new events to record them from addons. See nsITelemetry.idl for more details.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The unique category the events are registered in.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An object that contains registration data for 1+ events. Each property name is the category name, and the corresponding property value is an object of EventData type.

functions.name: setEventRecordingEnabled
functions.description: Enable recording of events in a category. Events default to recording disabled. This allows to toggle recording for all events in the specified category.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether recording is enabled for events in that category.
